member.name: T:Macrodef.MacroDefTask
member.remarks: Derived from Ant's macrodef task. Defines a new task, called , which uses the element as a template. The new task can have xml and xml child .

example.code: <macrodef name="assert-equals"> <attributes> <attribute name="name"/> <attribute name="expected"/> <attribute name="actual"/> </attributes> <sequential> <fail if="${ expected != actual}" message="${name}: expected '${expected}' but was '${actual}'"/> </sequential> </macrodef>

<macrodef name="macro-with-elements"> <elements> <element name="element1"/> </elements> <sequential> <echo message="before element1"/> <element1/> <echo message="after element1"/> </sequential> </macrodef> <macro-with-elements> <element1> <echo message="element1"/> </element1> </macro-with-elements>
